0: AN ACT ENCOURAGING YOUTH SECTOR PARTICIPATION IN THE AGRICULTURAL SECTOR, ESTABLISHING FOR THE PURPOSE A "TULONG KABATAAN SA AGRIKULTURA PROGRAM" AND A "TULONG KABATAAN SA AGRIKULTURA TRUST FUND", APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04202
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ENCOURAGING YOUTH SECTOR PARTICIPATION IN THE AGRICULTURAL SECTOR, ESTABLISHING FOR THE PURPOSE A "TULONG KABATAAN SA AGRIKULTURA PROGRAM" AND A "TULONG KABATAAN SA AGRIKULTURA TRUST FUND", APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED
DATE FILED : 2019-08-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2019-11-19
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-19
          -The Committee created a technical working group (TWG), to be headed by Rep. Angel Marcos Barba, to further study the measure.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-09-03
